means: 邪恶的力量、势力或化身
extendible video interactive language 可扩充视频交互语言

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均含"坏的"之意。
means: bad ： 含义广泛，指任何不好的或不合需要的品质。
evil ： 语气比bad强，强调道德上的邪恶不良，含狡猾凶险或危害他人的意味。
ill与evil意义接近，但语气弱一些，常指道德或性质方面的不良。
poor ： 普通用词，侧重指事物的质量或数量低于标准或不合要求。用于指天气与食品时可与bad通用。
wicked ： 语气比evil强，指居心叵测，任意违反道德标准，有意作恶。

sentence.Network_en: When we go out, girls are always giving me the evil eye.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们出去时，女孩子们总是用忌妒的眼神看着我。

sentence.Network_en: Two and a half years ago I gave up the evil weed.
sentence.Network_cn: 两年半以前我改邪归正，不抽大麻了。

sentence.Network_en: With knowledge and wisdom, evil could be vanquished on this earth.
sentence.Network_cn: 拥有了知识和智慧就能够把恶势力从这个世界上铲除。

jx.jx_en_mean: a gaze or stare superstitiously believed to cause material harm
jx.jx_cn_mean: 恶毒眼光（按照迷信的观点，这样的眼光会使人遭受实质性的伤害）

lj.lj_ly: he &B{gave} me &B{the evil eye} as I walked down the corridor.
lj.lj_ls: 我经过走廊时他恶毒地看了我一眼。

jx.jx_cn_mean: 尽量拖延不做令人不快的事

lj.lj_ly: it is a sin to speak evil of the king.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English yfel, of Germanic origin; related to Dutch euvel and German übel

entry.def: Evil is a powerful force that some people believe to exist, and which causes wicked and bad things to happen.

example.ex: We are still being attacked by the forces of evil...
example.tran: 我们仍在遭受邪恶力量的攻击。

example.ex: There's always a conflict between good and evil in his plays.
example.tran: 他的戏剧中总是有善恶之间的斗争。

entry.def: Evil is used to refer to all the wicked and bad things that happen in the world.

example.ex: He could not, after all, stop all the evil in the world.
example.tran: 毕竟他无法阻止世界上的所有恶行。

example.ex: ...those who see television as the root of all evil.
example.tran: 那些将电视视为万恶之源的人

entry.def: If you refer to an evil, you mean a very unpleasant or harmful situation or activity.

example.ex: Apartheid is even a greater evil...
example.tran: 种族隔离是更大的祸害。

example.ex: Higher taxes may be a necessary evil.
example.tran: 提高税收可能会很不受欢迎，但却是必要的。

entry.def: If you describe someone as evil, you mean that they are very wicked by nature and take pleasure in doing things that harm other people.

example.tran: 该国最邪恶的恐怖分子

entry.tran: 危害社会的；道德败坏的
entry.def: If you describe something as evil, you mean that you think it causes a great deal of harm to people and is morally bad.

example.ex: After 1760 few Americans refrained from condemning slavery as evil...
example.tran: 1760年后，很多美国人都在谴责奴隶制的社会危害。

example.ex: They are setting an evil example for their children.
example.tran: 他们正给孩子们树立道德败坏的反面形象。

entry.tran: 受魔鬼影响的;恶魔的;不祥的
entry.def: If you describe something as evil, you mean that you think it is influenced by the devil.

example.ex: I think this is an evil spirit at work...
example.tran: 我认为这是恶魔在作祟。

example.ex: According to local folklore it is an evil place.
example.tran: 据当地民间传说，那是个不祥的地方。

entry.def: You can describe a very unpleasant smell as evil.

example.ex: Both men were smoking evil-smelling pipes.
example.tran: 两个男人都在抽着难闻的烟斗。

entry.def: If someone is putting off the evil day or the evil hour, they have to do something unpleasant and are trying to avoid doing it for as long as possible.

example.ex: You can simply go on putting off the evil day and eventually find yourself smoking as much as ever.
example.tran: 你当然可以想方设法摆脱，但最后你会发现自己还是像以前一样拼命抽烟。

entry.def: If you have two choices, but think that they are both bad, you can describe the one which is less bad as the lesser of two evils, or the lesser evil .

example.ex: People voted for him as the lesser of two evils...
example.tran: 人们投票支持他只不过是两害相权取其轻罢了。

example.ex: One suspects that hydro power is still the lesser evil.
example.tran: 有人认为水力发电仍旧是两害相较取其轻。

means.word_mean: 2. that which causes harm or destruction or misfortune;

sentences.sentence: "the evil that men do lives after them; the good is oft interred with their bones"- Shakespeare

means.word_mean: 3. the quality of being morally wrong in principle or practice;

sentences.sentence: "attempts to explain the origin of evil in the world"

means.word_mean: 4. having or exerting a malignant influence;

auth_sentence.content: God only knows what the evil humans are doing.
auth_sentence.res_content: God only knows what the evil humans are doing.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: God only knows what the evil humans are doing.

auth_sentence.content: Chaos and order are similar to good and evil.
auth_sentence.res_content: Chaos and order are similar to good and evil.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Chaos and order are similar to good and evil.

auth_sentence.content: The Yankees used to be "Goldfinger" evil.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The Yankees used to be "Goldfinger" evil.

Sentence.sentence: But I suppose that's what these films are all about — good triumphing over evil.
They triumphed ultimately over evil in the battle
Money is considered to be the root of all evils.
Many social evils are caused by wrong government policies.

means.word_mean: 邪恶的, 坏的，恶毒的

sentences.en: He is an evil man with evil ideas, and leads an evil life.
sentences.cn: 他是一个满脑子恶念头的邪恶的人, 过着一种罪恶的生活。

means.word_mean: 讨厌的, 使人不舒服的，令人作呕的

sentences.cn: 这是一个坏透了的夜晚。

means.word_mean: 邪恶, 罪恶, 祸害，罪行

sentences.en: Love of money is the root of all evil.
Tobacco is considered by some to be an evil.
sentences.cn: 烟草被有些人认为是一种祸害。

jushi.english: He is an evil man with evil ideas, and leads an evil life.
jushi.chinese: 他是一个满脑子恶念头的邪恶的人,过着一种罪恶的生活。

jushi.english: Helen was helpless against such an evil tongue.
jushi.chinese: 海伦对这样的诽谤毫无办法。
